name: IShowBACKROOMS REMAKE
description:
Story:

After 2 years of making his own game, Jack is ready to release it to the word.  But just as he is about to upload it something goes wrong. He is transported into another dimension beyond comprehension. But he is not alone.

Gameplay:

Manage your stamina and flashlight as you run through the yellow halls of the backrooms. All the while IShowSpeed chases you down. Find the gates. find the button and find a way out.

Features:

2 endings, 3 game modes and an active development plan to last at least 3-6 months so you never get bored.

NOW AVAILABLE ON MAC AND LINUX

Discord server : https://discord.gg/muZFWN2bp
